sourcesContent: <<<<<<< HEAD >>>>>>> a6fb420213eff05c3c12e0fc0f2f2280c9b87b31 import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Project } from './projects/Models/project'; import { task } from './task/Models/task'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'], }) export class AppComponent { title = 'PMSNGApp'; project: Project | undefined; taskId:number|undefined; timeSheetId:number|undefined; onReceiveProjectId(selectedProjectevent: Project) { this.project = selectedProjectevent; } onReceiveTaskId(selectedTaskId: number) { this.taskId = selectedTaskId; } onReceiveTimeSheetId(timesheetId:number){ this.timeSheetId=timesheetId; } }
